message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $14,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my means.
